bestViewPoint._instruction: Add the coordinate point identifying the best view of this custom annotation in space.

coordinateSpace._instruction: Add the coordinate space in which this custom annotation exists.

criteria._instruction: Add the protocol execution defining the criteria that were applied to produce this custom annotation.

criteriaQualityType._instruction: Add the quality type of the stated criteria used to define this custom annotation.

definedIn._instruction: Add the (source) file in which this custom annotation is defined in.

displayColor._instruction: Enter the preferred display color (HEX) for this custom annotation.

inspiredBy._instruction: Add one or several (source) files that inspired the definition of this custom annotation.

internalIdentifier._instruction: Enter the identifier used for this custom annotation within the file it is stored in.

laterality._instruction: Add one or both sides of the body, bilateral organ or bilateral organ part that this custom annotation is defined in.

name._instruction: Enter a descriptive name for this custom annotation.
